You have coding forums, yet you don’t know how to add “&& playerRights >= 2” to an if statement?

[/quote]rofl listen to yh, id stfu if i was u i bet u dnt no wut a moron.java is ooh forgot its u wooot,[/quote]You completely fucked up the quote, and you have to [size=50pt]ADD THE “&& playerRights >= 2” TO THE IF STATEMENT YOU FUCKING RETARD[/size]

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Rage")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!"); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true;
